front.title: Connection-less Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (CLDAP) to Historic Status

abstract.t: The Connection-less Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (CLDAP)technical specification, RFC 1798, was published in 1995 as a ProposedStandard. This document discusses the reasons why the CLDAP technicalspecification has not been furthered on the Standard Track. Thisdocument recommends that RFC 1798 be moved to Historic status.
